page.title: 13LITTLE MERSLEY BARN,POTTERY
page.content: You are invited to watch Molly Attrill, studio potter, at work at Little Mersley Barn, Newchurch. The pottery was established in 1982 and is sited in a converted barn built in 1802. The pots being displayed in the loft area and the working section and kilns are on the ground floor. Molly Attrill uses earthenware clay for the most part but takes great pride in the fact that she uses some local brick clay. She makes a variety of pots for table, kitchen and garden-pots which give pleasure in everyday use. 90% of the ware is thrown using traditional methods _ most fascinating to view.
